rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
加州领导人与医疗行业争夺数十亿美元的 Medi-Cal 新资金州长加文·纽瑟姆 (Gavin Newsom)、州立法者和医疗行业领袖在 Medi-Cal 于 11 月向选民交付之前，距离就数十亿新美元达成协议的时间很短。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/California-leaders-tussle-with-health-industry-over-billions-of-new-dollars-for-Medi-Cal.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/California-leaders-tussle-with-health-industry-over-billions-of-new-dollars-for-Medi-Cal.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7bc97c82-6c40-4c3e-bf39-b236f1a86605 Thu, 20 Jun 2024 15:36:52 -0400 California leaders tussle with health industry over billions of new dollars for Medi-Cal
适度锻炼可减少员工的倦怠并提高工作满意度密歇根大学的一项新研究发现，与不太活跃的同事相比，适度锻炼的员工在工作中感觉不那么情绪疲惫，个人满意度更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/Moderate-exercise-linked-to-reduced-burnout-and-higher-job-satisfaction-among-employees.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/Moderate-exercise-linked-to-reduced-burnout-and-higher-job-satisfaction-among-employees.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=05971e4b-145f-4a52-a977-d35d7271b3bd Thu, 20 Jun 2024 15:32:57 -0400 Moderate exercise linked to reduced burnout and higher job satisfaction among employees
JAK 抑制剂与检查点抑制剂相结合可改善癌症免疫治疗反应由于并非所有癌症患者都对一种主要的癌症免疫治疗药物（称为免疫检查点抑制剂）有反应，科学家们探索了添加 janus 激酶 (JAK) 抑制剂（治疗慢性炎症的药物）是否有帮助。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/Combining-JAK-inhibitors-with-checkpoint-inhibitors-improves-cancer-immunotherapy-response.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/Combining-JAK-inhibitors-with-checkpoint-inhibitors-improves-cancer-immunotherapy-response.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b7918d5f-e6fd-4681-9c0c-b5242ea28b3a Thu, 20 Jun 2024 15:26:45 -0400 Combining JAK inhibitors with checkpoint inhibitors improves cancer immunotherapy response
无创尿液检测有助于血尿患者早期发现膀胱癌膀胱癌的最初症状之一可能是尿中带血（血尿）。研究人员开发并分析了一种简化的基于 DNA 的尿液检测结果，以提高血尿患者膀胱癌早期检测的准确性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/Nongraduate-urine-test-enhances-early-detection-of-bladder-cancer-in-病人-with-hematuria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/Nongraduate-urine-test-enhances-early-detection-of-bladder-cancer-in-患者-with-hematuria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b63a3a4d-e4ce-476b-85f1-e945f8822fe4 Thu, 20 Jun 2024 15:22:00 -0400 Noninvasive urine test enhances early detection of bladder cancer in patients with hematuria
酶通讯的突破可能为新药铺平道路伯明翰大学的一项研究突破发现了一种可以帮助科学家利用酶用于药物发现的机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/Breakthrough-in-enzyme-communication-could-pave-the-way-for-new-drugs-A-Mechanism-T.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/Breakthrough-in-enzyme-communication-could-pave-the-way-for-new-drugs-A-Mechanism-T.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e1f8fad8-e78f-42d1-a8a2-5a162cf1084d Thu, 20 Jun 2024 15:15:00 -0400 Breakthrough in enzyme communication could pave the way for new drugs
简单的测试可以彻底改变危及生命的遗传性心律失常的诊断一组国际研究人员揭示了一种新的、简单的临床测试来检测钙释放缺乏综合症（CRDS），这是一种危及生命的遗传性心律失常，会导致危险的心跳加快，并可能导致心脏骤停和死亡等严重并发症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/Simple-test-could-revolutionize-diagnosis-of-life-throne-genic-arrythmia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/Simple-test-could-revolutionize-diagnosis-of-life-throne-genic-arrythmia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c1fbc62d-b5a0-4512-87f7-90f06aed6fa0 Thu, 20 Jun 2024 15:03:25 -0400 Simple test could revolutionize diagnosis of life-threatening genetic arrhythmia
SMIM1基因在肥胖中的作用被发现科学家们发现了缺乏特定血型的人在遗传上容易超重或肥胖的新原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/Role-of-SMIM1-gene-in-obesity-uncovered.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/Role-of-SMIM1-gene-in-obesity-uncovered.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ef8fa835-38ba-40b8-8029-a73848223f69 Thu, 20 Jun 2024 14:48:38 -0400 Role of SMIM1 gene in obesity uncovered
WEHI 分拆旨在彻底改变癌症药物的开发随着 Ternarx 的推出，澳大利亚巩固了其成为下一代药物主要参与者的角色。Ternarx 是一家具有全球竞争力的生物技术公司，致力于寻找难治性癌症的新疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/WEHI-spinout-aims-to-revolutionize-the-development-of-cancer-drugs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/WEHI-spinout-aims-to-revolutionize-the-development-of-cancer-drugs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=54acc7bc-1b36-489e-a8c6-b7789860ac80 Thu, 20 Jun 2024 14:37:06 -0400 WEHI spinout aims to revolutionize the development of cancer drugs
手术前后改良化疗可提高胰腺癌患者的生存率耶鲁大学癌症中心 (YCC) 和耶鲁大学医学院研究人员的一项新研究表明，在手术前和手术后接受化疗的胰腺癌患者的生存率比手术后化疗的预期生存率要长。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/Modified-form-of-chemotherapy-before-and-after-surgery-enhances-survival-in-pancreatic-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/Modified-form-of-chemotherapy-before-and-after-surgery-enhances-survival-in-pancreatic-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d8604d32-569f-4c5e-9a83-2095f69a497b Thu, 20 Jun 2024 14:31:00 -0400 Modified form of chemotherapy before and after surgery enhances survival in pancreatic cancer patients
世卫组织就伪造索马鲁肽发出医疗产品警报世界卫生组织 (WHO) 发布了关于伪造索马鲁肽的医疗产品警报，这种药物在一些国家用于治疗 2 型糖尿病和肥胖症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/WHO-issues-medical-product-alert-on-falsified-semaglutides.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/WHO-issues-medical-product-alert-on-falsified-semagluides.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=de151ea1-6ce7-4891-b17a-f2f0274cda53 Thu, 20 Jun 2024 14:07:13 -0400 WHO issues medical product alert on falsified semaglutides
